text: These things are fragile as hell. They are a bit small too.

Should've read more reviews. These glasses are absolute garage. I'm not really that picky when it comes to sunglasses but even for me these are crap. I guess it's a "get what you pay for" kinda thing.

As far as how dark the lenses are, they're great. Great style and color. When I got my set in the mail, the left ear piece hinge is in such a bind that it feels like it's going to break every time I go to fold them up. The right side is perfect, just the left side is messed up.
not bad for the price if I loose them no problem
I would say i have a regular shaped head and these fit tight like they were for kids.....and they're NOT as dark as the picture.
Great sunglasses I need to find a nice but kinda cheap aviator sunglasses this one works real we'll
Worthless, cannot see through them, looks like your looking through smoke
Glasses are too small, they look like children's wear. The part that is supposed to go over your ear, doesn't really reach.
Loved them at first, but then got horribly bent out of shape after a couple days
I guess they look good but are too dark to see out of.

Too dark and bad lens quality. It says polarized but I wonder. First they were sold for 10 dollar and now for 5.80. I really wonder if they are UV protected.
I am not a sunglass expert but it doesn't look like good quality lenses
Shape is fine and they look solid and are light.
Save your money! The metal is very bendy. The lenses have a weird rainbow like stain across them easily visible in bright light.

These do not have dark lenses and they are HUGE! I have a very round face and these won't even stay on my face. I'll have to see if I can modify them somehow just to wear them or return them... leaning towards the return since they're not even dark.
way too small and too dark, I can't see anything out of them. I guess you get what you pay for, do not buy.
